cause.description:
Being aware of bad stuff wont make it go away. That money you're donating mostly covers overhead expenses. 8lllllllllD >)
1. Get laid & get paid.
2. Let all activists/hippies know they're stupid.
3. Destroy all jam-bands.
4. End all causes.
cause.mission: To end all causes and eliminate hippies.
cause.name: End All Causes
